actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Energy Administration Act of 1974 to provide that the Federal Energy Administration conduct a national media campaign promoting increased residential insulation.

summary.text: Provides under the Federal Energy Administration Act that the Federal Energy Administration conduct a national media campaign promoting increased residential insulation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Energy Administration Act of 1974 to provide that the Federal Energy Administration conduct a national media campaign promoting increased residential insulation.
